content:
A reminder that the QA changes need to be applied by this Sunday if they are to be included in the upcoming ballot. It would help us immensely if you could:

  • reply to this message, indicating that you will be applying changes for a particular workfroup
  • indicate in the spreadsheet when a change has been applied (we've added a new column to record this)

Appreciate that the time is starting to run out, but the deadlines are pretty fixed...
yes: the deadlines really are fixed - as the spec grows in size, and the number of implementation guides increases, the amount of buffer time for publishing is decreasing
I will hit the OO stuff as best I can - (spring break here)
let me know if you can't make it - Wes Rishel (of the spelling dictionary fame) has been great at filling in the gaps...
I will be working on Patient Care changes.
We probably should not have wasted time doing QA on the draft resources. I am deferring applying them.
Chris and I will be working on Clinical Reasoning changes.
Just a reminder that there's about 24 hours left to apply changes... (A deadline over easter wasn't, perhaps, the cleverest thing we could have done)...
That deadline was driven by the ballot deadline which was driven by the WGM which was picked a couple of years ago and driven by hotel availability, etc.
